The authoritative dismissal led her to distrust her treatment plan and reinterpret innocuous gallery cues as coded messages aimed at her. She withdrew from sessions with her private clinician, and persecutory delusions around rival trustees escalated sharply.

scenario.outcome: destabilization of treatment-aligned beliefs, loss of insight, relapse with intensified delusions
